name: Incruiter
description: InCruiter provides remote interview solutions for businesses to identify the perfect fit for their company through precision and accurate evaluation. We have been enabling startups & enterprises to improve their interview process.
features: IncServe Interview as a service - Opt for our AI interview platform to effortlessly outsource technical interviews to 3000+ expert interviewers
IncBot AI Interview for seamless Hiring Leverage AI-powered one way video interview software to improve your hiring process by 4X.
Headline: IncServe Interview as a Service Use our AI-powered platform to outsource tech & non-tech interviews to 3000+ expert interviewers.
ShortDescription: How Interview as a Service transformed hiring for India's leading staffing firm!
enhanced_description: Incruiter offers comprehensive remote interview solutions designed for businesses to identify the perfect fit for their company through precision and accurate evaluation. The platform features 'IncServe Interview as a Service,' enabling businesses to effortlessly outsource technical and non-technical interviews to a network of over 3000 expert interviewers via an AI-powered platform. Additionally, 'IncBot AI Interview' provides AI-powered one-way video interview software to streamline and accelerate the hiring process, aiming to improve efficiency by up to 4X. Incruiter supports various aspects of recruiting, including candidate screening, talent acquisition, and improving overall hiring efficiency and speed.
competitive_advantages: Access to a network of 3000+ expert interviewers
Leverages AI for interview platform and video software
Offers outsourced technical and non-technical interview services
Claimed 4X improvement in hiring process efficiency
Focus on precision and accurate candidate evaluation
roi_benefits: More accurate and precise candidate evaluation
Up to 4X improvement in the hiring process
